;----------------------------------------------------------
;----NWM SECTION----
;----------------------------------------------------------
;NETWORK WIDENING MOD
;by JPlumbley, Tarkus, superhands, jondor, woodb3kmaster, and Flann
;Started a long time ago
;Updated May 2021
;Header Section
;
;Diagonal S-Curve Smooth (0x51035C00-E00)
;Into piece 1
0x51030200,3,0,0x5F995C00,0,0=0x51030200,3,0,0x51035C00,0,0
0x51030200,3,0,0x5F995C00,1,1=0x51030200,3,0,0x51035C00,1,1
0x51030200,2,1,0x5F995C00,0,0=0x51030200,2,1,0x51035C00,0,0
0x51030200,2,1,0x5F995C00,1,1=0x51030200,2,1,0x51035C00,1,1
;piece 1 to piece 2
0x51035C00,3,0,0x5F995D00,3,0=0x51035C00,3,0,0x51035D00,3,0
0x51035C00,1,1,0x5F995D00,1,0=0x51035C00,1,0,0x51035D00,1,0
;piece 2 to piece 3
0x51035D00,0,0,0x5F995E00,0,0=0x51035D00,0,0,0x51035E00,0,0
0x51035D00,2,1,0x5F995E00,2,1=0x51035D00,2,1,0x51035E00,2,1
;piece 3 to opposite piece 2
0x51035E00,3,0,0x5F995D00,1,0=0x51035E00,3,0,0x51035D00,1,0
0x51035E00,1,1,0x5F995D00,3,1=0x51035E00,1,1,0x51035D00,3,1
;piece 2 to opposite piece 3
0x51035D00,3,0,0x5F995E00,1,0=0x51035D00,3,0,0x51035E00,1,0
0x51035D00,1,1,0x5F995E00,3,1=0x51035D00,1,1,0x51035E00,3,1
;opposite piece 2 to opposite piece 1
0x51035D00,1,0,0x5F995C00,1,0=0x51035D00,1,0,0x51035C00,1,0
0x51035D00,3,1,0x5F995C00,3,1=0x51035D00,3,1,0x51035C00,3,1
;opposite piece 1 out
0x51035C00,2,0,0x09000A00,1,0=0x51035C00,2,0,0x51030200,1,0
0x51035C00,0,1,0x09000A00,2,0=0x51035C00,0,1,0x51030200,2,0

;NWM WRCs
;Small 90-Degree Curve
;Single-Tile Networks (2x2)
;TLA-3
